how to romance karlach in bg3
content: ould clash with Astarion and Lae'zel's Cruel tendencies Karlach approves of actions taken to the benefit of the Druid Grove tieflings and Heroic actions in general. Karlach consistently likes respecting surrenders. Will gain disapproval consistently if you keep executing prisoners or surrenderees. Karlach is distrustful of and generally hateful towards devils. Karlach wants her infernal engine heart repaired which needs Infernal Iron. There are multiple pieces of Infernal Iron in Act I/ the wild
